org.araneaframework.uilib.form.formlist
Class InMemoryFormListHelper<K,R>

java.lang.Object
  org.araneaframework.uilib.form.formlist.InMemoryFormListHelper<K,R>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class InMemoryFormListHelper<K,R>
extends Object
implements Serializable

Helper that facilitates holding the editable list rows in memory without saving them to database. Useful when the editable list should be persisted only in the very end of user session.

Author:
Jevgeni Kabanov (ekabanov@araneaframework.org)
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

InMemoryFormListHelper

public InMemoryFormListHelper(BaseFormListWidget<K,R> formList,
                              Collection<R> initialData)
Constructs the helper for given formList, filling it with initial values.

Parameters:
formList - The form list object.
initialData - Initial row objects.
Method Detail

add

public void add(R row)
Adds a new row object. The key of the row is retrieved using the row handler from the form list.

Parameters:
row - The row to add.

addWithKey

public void addWithKey(K id,
                       R row)
Adds a new row object using a provided key. Use this method instead of add(Object) when the row handler won't resolve the Id, or a custom Id must be provided.

Parameters:
id - The Id to associate with the row.
row - The row to add.

update

public void update(K id,
                   R row)
Updates a row object by Id. This method won't call any handlers, just updates its internal data.

Parameters:
id - The Id that is associated with the row.
row - The row that is updated.

delete

public void delete(K id)
Removes a row object by id. This method won't call any handlers, just updates its internal data.

Parameters:
id - The Id that is associated with the row that is to be deleted.

getKey

public K getKey(R row)
Provides the key for the row object using the form list row handler.

Parameters:
row - The row for which the Id is resolved.
Returns:
The Id associated with the row.

getAdded

public Map<K,R> getAdded()
Provides the list row objects that were added by the user during the session.

Returns:
A map of keys and associated rows that were added by the user during the session.

getDeleted

public Set<K> getDeleted()
Provides the list row objects that were deleted by the user during the session.

Returns:
A map of keys and associated rows that were added by the user during the session.

getUpdated

public Map<K,R> getUpdated()
Provides the list row objects that were updated (modified) by the user during the session.

Returns:
A map of keys and associated rows that were updated (modified) by the user during the session.

getCurrent

public Map<K,R> getCurrent()
Provides all list row objects that are currently displayed in the list.

Returns:
A map of keys and associated rows that are currently displayed in the list.
